post.title: Cool Toy From the Teacher
post.content: As I wrote this morning, I’m in training this week. The instructor (who I wrote earlier is “pretty good”) is Jon Flanders. I didn’t recognize his name, but I did recognize his Atlas based WF Designer that he released a month and a half ago or so. It’s a cool piece of work so it’s doubly cool (for me anyway) that he’s teaching this class.
